mapper.select: SELECT B.BUCKEY_LIST buckList, B.MEMBER_NO memberNo, PRODUCT_NO productNo, B.PRODUCT_QUANTITY quantity, P.PRODUCT_NAME FROM BUCKEY_LIST B JOIN PRODUCT P USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUCKEY_LIST( BUCKEY_LIST, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_QUANTITY ) VALUES( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{productNo}, #{productQuantity} )
